Sentencas: The performance of anode-supported cells with a composite LSM-YSZ cathode and an LSM current collector was investigated.
Titulo: Electrode activation and passivation of solid oxide fuel cell electrodes

Sentencas: Over the first 48 hours, after the application of a constant current, the cell voltage was observed to increase by up to 20%.
Titulo: Electrode activation and passivation of solid oxide fuel cell electrodes

Sentencas: When the current was switched off, the cell resistance increased significantly over the next four days at open circuit conditions.
Titulo: Electrode activation and passivation of solid oxide fuel cell electrodes

Sentencas: Apparently, at OCV conditions cell passivation occurs.
Titulo: Electrode activation and passivation of solid oxide fuel cell electrodes

Sentencas: The cell gradually reactivates, once the current is switched on again.
Titulo: Electrode activation and passivation of solid oxide fuel cell electrodes

Sentencas: Part of this activation/passivation process is fast enough to influence the resistance of the cell during i-V measurements (over less than 1 hour) and a considerable hysteresis is observed in the cell voltage during these measurements.
Titulo: Electrode activation and passivation of solid oxide fuel cell electrodes

Sentencas: Impedance spectroscopy was used to investigate the activation/passivation process.
Titulo: Electrode activation and passivation of solid oxide fuel cell electrodes

Sentencas: It was found that the series resistance and the part of the polarisation impedance above approximately 100 Hz were not influenced by the activation/passivation process.
Titulo: Electrode activation and passivation of solid oxide fuel cell electrodes

Sentencas: The part of the polarisation impedance between I and 100 Hz was highly influenced by the activation/passivation process and during cell polarisation this part of the polarisation impedance was up to 40% lower than at open circuit conditions.
Titulo: Electrode activation and passivation of solid oxide fuel cell electrodes

Sentencas: This frequency range of the spectrum was also sensitive to the oxygen partial pressure at the cathode side, indicating that it is the cathode that activates and passivates.
Titulo: Electrode activation and passivation of solid oxide fuel cell electrodes
